Html: By implenting IContent I can obviously catch when my page is being navigated to/from etc.. but from this child page is there anyway I can handle when the parent page is being navigated from in particular?

IContent.OnNavigatingFrom is invoked for the current frame and any parent frames. The event args of type NavigatingCancelEventArgs has property IsParentFrameNavigating indicating whether it's this or a parent frame that is doing a navigate.

Other IContent navigation methods operate on the current frame only.
